file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-11-04-04 - MAIN-DOOR FOLDING FLAP - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN-DOOR FOLDING FLAP - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS DOOR 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the folding flap of the main door. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH AIR- 52-11-04-000-801-A MAIN-DOOR FOLDING FLAP - REMOVAL STAIRS DOOR AIRCRAFT WITH AIR- MAIN-DOOR FOLDING FLAP - INSTALLA- 52-11-04-400-801-A STAIRS DOOR TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-11-04 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-11-04-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS DOOR 2. MAIN-DOOR FOLDING FLAP - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the folding flap of the main door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 52-10-00/1 AMM TASK 25-23-04-000-801-A/400 MAIN-DOOR LINING PANEL - REMOVAL MAIN-DOOR STEP-TREAD LINING PANEL - REMOV- AMM TASK 52-10-02-000-801-A/400 AL AMM TASK 52-10-04-000-801-A/400 MAIN-DOOR RUBBER TRIM SEAL - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Main door I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open the main door (AMM SDS 52-10-00/1). (2) Remove the fifth tread lining panel (the lowest when the main door is open) (AMM TASK 52-10-02-000-801-A/400). (3) Remove the trim cover from the main door ( AMM TASK 25-23-04-000-801-A/400). (4) Remove the rubber-trim seal from the contour of the folding flap ( AMM TASK 52-10-04-000-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-11-04 Page 2 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the cotter pin (18), nut (19), washer (20), and bolt (22) to disconnect the rod (21) end from the support (14) at the folding flap (7). (2) Remove the cotter pin (4), nut (3), washer (2), and bolt (23) to disconnect the rod (1) end from the support at the folding flap (7). (3) Remove the nuts (17), washers (16), and screws (12) (16 positions) that attach the folding flap (7) to the hinge (13). (4) Remove the plate (6). CAUTION: BE CAREFUL TO PREVENT DAMAGE TO THE RUBBER-TRIM SEAL DURING THE FOLDING FLAP REMOVAL. (5) Pull the rubber trim (5) to get access to the pin (15) of the hinge (13). (6) Remove the pin (15). (7) Remove the folding flap (7). (8) If necessary, remove the folding flap edge (10) as follows: (a) Support the folding flap (7) on a bench. (b) Remove the nuts (8), washers (9), and screws (11) (20 positions) that attach the folding flap edge to the folding flap. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-11-04 Page 3 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS DOOR Folding Flap - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A DET. A ZONE 811 1. ROD 2. WASHER B 3. NUT 4. COTTERPIN 23. BOLT 5. RUBBER TRIM 22. BOLT 6. PLATE 21. ROD 20. WASHER 19. NUT 18. COTTERPIN 17. NUT (16) 7. FOLDING FLAP 16. WASHER (16) 8. NUT (20) 15. PIN 14. SUPPORT 9. WASHER (20) 13. HINGE 10. FOLDING FLAP EDGE RUBBER-TRIM SEAL (REF.) DET. B 12. SCREW (16) 11. SCREW (20) EM145AMM520039B.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-11-04 Page 4 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-11-04-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS DOOR 3. MAIN-DOOR FOLDING FLAP - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the folding flap of the main door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 52-10-00/1 MAIN DOOR-TO-FUSELAGE SKIN STEP - ADJUST- AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-808-A/500 MENT AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-811-A/500 MAIN-DOOR FOLDING FLAP - ADJUSTMENT AMM TASK 52-10-04-400-801-A/400 MAIN-DOOR RUBBER TRIM SEAL - INSTALLATION MAIN DOOR - ACTUATING AND LOCKING MECHA- IPC 52-11-00 NISM TASK 52-10-01-700-807-A - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 811 Main door D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially To get access to the folding flap edge when Workstand available the main door is closed E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MIL-F-38249, TYPE I RTV157 AR ASTM C-920 RTV780 AR G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) Cotter pin IPC 52-11-00 2 EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-11-04 Page 5 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Main door I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Open the main door. (2) Put the folding flap (7) at the main door. (3) Install the pin (15) on the hinge (13). (4) Apply RTV157 or RTV780 sealant to the hinge (13) at the folding flap (7). (5) Put the rubber trim (5) in position. (6) Put the plate (6) in position. (7) Install the screws (12), washers (16), and nuts (17) (16 positions) to attach the folding flap (7) to the door. NOTE: If the folding flap edge was removed, you must not install the last and the first screws. (8) Apply RTV157 or RTV780 sealant along the junction between the plate (6) and the folding flap (7), and between the plate (6) and the door. (9) Put the rod (1) on the support at the folding flap (7) and install the bolt (23), washer (2), and nut (3). (10) Put the rod (21) on the support (14) at the folding flap (7) and install the bolt (22), washer (20), and nut (19). (11) Install the rubber trim seal along the contour of the folding flap ( AMM TASK 52-10-04-400-801-A/400). (12) If applicable, install the folding flap edge as follows: (a) Put the folding flap edge in position. (b) Install a minimum of three fasteners (11) and measure the gaps. Refer to TASK 52-10-01-700-807-A. (c) Install the remaining fasteners (11). (13) Adjust the folding flap as given in AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-811-A/500. (14) Do a check of the main door-to-fuselage skin step , as given in AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-808-A/500, at points 12 and 13. (15) Install new cotter pins (4) and (18). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-11-04 Page 6 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close and lock the main door (AMM SDS 52-10-00/1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-11-04 Page 7 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
